languages.text: {n}Не успеваете вы активировать вокс, как оглушительный скрежет помех заглушает эфир, заставляя всех на корабле встрепенуться. Вы прокашливаетесь и обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью, однако замечаете только перешептывания за спиной и безразличные взгляды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Не успеваете вы активировать вокс, как оглушительный скрежет помех заглушает эфир, заставляя всех на корабле встрепенуться. Вы прокашливаетесь и обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью, однако замечаете только перешептывания за спиной и безразличные взгляды.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Не успеваете вы активировать вокс, как оглушительный скрежет помех заглушает эфир, заставляя всех на корабле встрепенуться. Вы прокашливаетесь и обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью, однако замечаете только перешептывания за спиной и безразличные взгляды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the team with a rousing speech but spot only glances behind your back and indifferent stares.{/n}

{n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the team with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

{n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the team with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

{n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que puedas activar el voco, un chirrido de estática inunda el aire, haciendo que todo el mundo preste atención. Carraspeas y diriges un gran discurso a la tripulación, pero solo recibes susurros y miradas indiferentes como respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que puedas activar el voco, un chirrido de estática inunda el aire, haciendo que todo el mundo preste atención. Carraspeas y diriges un gran discurso a la tripulación, pero solo recibes susurros y miradas indiferentes como respuesta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你启动音阵系统之前，空气中回荡着刺耳的静电声，引起了所有船员的注意。你清了清嗓子，向所有人发表了一场振奋人心的演讲，但你得到的反应只有低语声与无动于衷的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你启动音阵系统之前，空气中回荡着刺耳的静电声，引起了所有船员的注意。你清了清嗓子，向所有人发表了一场振奋人心的演讲，但你得到的反应只有低语声与无动于衷的目光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスを起動しようとすると、耳をつんざくような電波のキーンという音が空を切り裂き、乗船している者達がバッとこちらに視線を向けた。ゴホンと咳払いをしてクルーに熱いスピーチを披露するものの、ひそひそ声と冷めた視線だけが突き刺さる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスを起動しようとすると、耳をつんざくような電波のキーンという音が空を切り裂き、乗船している者達がバッとこちらに視線を向けた。ゴホンと咳払いをしてクルーに熱いスピーチを披露するものの、ひそひそ声と冷めた視線だけが突き刺さる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bevor du das Vox aktivieren kannst, erfüllt ein kreischendes Rauschen die Luft, das alle an Bord strammstehen lässt. Du räusperst dich und hältst eine flammende Rede an die Crew, doch die einzige Reaktion sind Tuscheln und gleichgültige Blicke.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bevor du das Vox aktivieren kannst, erfüllt ein kreischendes Rauschen die Luft, das alle an Bord strammstehen lässt. Du räusperst dich und hältst eine flammende Rede an die Crew, doch die einzige Reaktion sind Tuscheln und gleichgültige Blicke.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avant que vous ne puissiez allumer le vox, un sifflement assourdissant retentit et fait sursauter tout le monde à bord. Vous vous raclez la gorge et donnez un discours passionné au vaisseau, mais recevez pour seule réponse des murmures et des regards indifférents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant que vous ne puissiez allumer le vox, un sifflement assourdissant retentit et fait sursauter tout le monde à bord. Vous vous raclez la gorge et donnez un discours passionné au vaisseau, mais recevez pour seule réponse des murmures et des regards indifférents.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sen daha voksu çalıştıramadan sağır edici bir parazit sesi çıkıyor ve gemideki herkesin yerinden sıçrayıp dikkat kesilmesine neden oluyor. Boğazını temizleyip ilham veren bir konuşmayla mürettebata sesleniyorsun ama karşılık olarak aldığın tek şey, fısıldaşmalar ve içlerinde herhangi bir duygu kıpırtısı uyanmamış bakışlar oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can activate the vox, a deafening screech of static fills the air, making everyone aboard jump to attention. You clear your throat and address the crew with a rousing speech, but whispers and indifferent stares are the only response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen daha voksu aktive edemeden, sağır edici bir parazit sesi çıkıyor ve gemideki herkesin yerinden sıçrayıp dikkat kesilmesine neden oluyor. Boğazını temizleyip ilham veren bir konuşmayla mürettebata sesleniyorsun ama karşılık olarak aldığın tek şey fısıldaşmalar ve içlerinde herhangi bir duygu kıpırtısı uyanmamış bakışlar oluyor.{/n}
